workshoptitle: Get Started with Oracle Big Data Service (non-HA)

tutorials.title: Introduction to Oracle Big Data Service (BDS)
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Big Data Service

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Review Creating BDS Environment Resources (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab reviews the tasks to setup your Big Data Service environment before you can create clusters.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a BDS Hadoop Cluster
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to create a BDS Highly Available (HA) Hadoop cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Add Oracle Cloud SQL to the Cluster
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to add Oracle Cloud SQL to your BDS cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Access a BDS Node Using a Public IP Address
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to map a node's private IP address to a public IP address

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Use Cloudera Manager and Hue to Access a BDS Cluster
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use Cloudera Manager (CM) and Hue to access a Big Data Service (BDS) cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create a Hadoop Administrator User
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create a Hadoop Administrator(superuser) that will have full access to all the data and metadata on the cluster.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
